content: Association football matchFootball match The **1984 AFC Asian Cup final** was a [football](/wiki/Association_football) match which determined the winner of the [1984 AFC Asian Cup](/wiki/1984_AFC_Asian_Cup), the 8th edition of the [AFC Asian Cup](/wiki/AFC_Asian_Cup), a quadrennial tournament contested by the men's national teams of the member associations of the [Asian Football Confederation](/wiki/Asian_Football_Confederation). The match was won by [Saudi Arabia](/wiki/Saudi_Arabia_national_football_team), defeating [China](/wiki/China_national_football_team) 2–0. ## Venue The [Former Singapore National Stadium](/wiki/Former_National_Stadium,_Singapore) was located in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), hosted the 1984 AFC Asian Cup final. The 55,000 Capacity Stadium opened in 1973 and closed in 2007. The stadium was demolished from 2010 to 2011 and replaced by [Singapore National Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_National_Stadium). It was only stadium used to host the 1984 Asian Cup; all matches were played in this stadium. ## Route to the final Saudi ArabiaRoundChina PROpponentsResult[Group stage](/wiki/1984_AFC_Asian_Cup#Group_stage)OpponentsResult [South Korea](/wiki/South_Korea_national_football_team)1–1Match 1 [Iran](/wiki/Iran_national_football_team)0–2 [Syria](/wiki/Syria_national_football_team)1–0Match 2 [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore_national_football_team)2–0 [Qatar](/wiki/Qatar_national_football_team)1–1Match 3 [India](/wiki/India_national_football_team)3–0 [Kuwait](/wiki/Kuwait_national_football_team)1–0Match 4 [United Arab Emirates](/wiki/United_Arab_Emirates_national_football_team)5–0**Group A Winners** PosTeam - [v](/wiki/1984_AFC_Asian_Cup#sports-table-Group_A) - t - e PldPts1 [Saudi Arabia](/wiki/Saudi_Arabia_national_football_team)462 [Kuwait](/wiki/Kuwait_national_football_team)453 [Qatar](/wiki/Qatar_national_football_team)444 [Syria](/wiki/Syria_national_football_team)435 [South Korea](/wiki/South_Korea_national_football_team)42Source: RSSSFFinal standings**Group B winners** PosTeam - [v](/wiki/1984_AFC_Asian_Cup#sports-table-Group_B) - t - e PldPts1 [China](/wiki/China_national_football_team)462 [Iran](/wiki/Iran_national_football_team)463 [United Arab Emirates](/wiki/United_Arab_Emirates_national_football_team)444 [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore_national_football_team) (H)435 [India](/wiki/India_national_football_team)41Source: RSSSF (H) HostsOpponentsResult[Knockout stage](/wiki/1984_AFC_Asian_Cup#Knockout_stage)OpponentsResult [Iran](/wiki/Iran_national_football_team)1–1 ([a.e.t.](/wiki/Overtime_(sports))) (5–4 [pen.](/wiki/Penalty_shootout_(association_football)))Semi-finals [Kuwait](/wiki/Kuwait_national_football_team)1–0 ([a.e.t.](/wiki/Overtime_(sports))) ##
